name.japanese: クリマ・タクト サンダーボルト

description: Nami uses her Clima-Tact weather manipulation weapon to generate powerful lightning strikes that can electrocute multiple enemies simultaneously. This represents an advanced application of her meteorological knowledge and weapon mastery.
strengths: Works on armed enemies with guns and metal equipment
Devastating power despite user not having Devil Fruit abilities
weaknesses: May be ineffective against rubber or insulated enemies
Dependent on having the Clima-Tact weapon
significance: Demonstrates Nami's growth as a combatant and proves that non-Devil Fruit users can be just as powerful as their powered counterparts. This ability saved Luffy when he was helpless against seastone.
visualDescription: Nami manipulates her Clima-Tact to create storm clouds that discharge powerful bolts of lightning, electrocuting enemies in a wide area.

keyMoments.description: First use of advanced lightning technique to defeat Marines in Jonathan's quarters
keyMoments.context: Used to save Luffy from seastone net trap
